00011 // parser.cpp*
00012 #include "pbrt.h"
00013 // Parsing Global Interface
00014 COREDLL bool ParseFile(const char *filename) {
00015         extern FILE *yyin;
00016         extern int yyparse(void);
00017         extern string current_file;
00018         extern int line_num;
00019         extern int yydebug;
00020 
00021         if (getenv("PBRT_YYDEBUG") != NULL)
00022                 yydebug = 1;
00023 
00024         if (strcmp(filename, "-") == 0)
00025                 yyin = stdin;
00026         else
00027                 yyin = fopen(filename, "r");
00028         if (yyin != NULL) {
00029                 current_file = filename;
00030                 if (yyin == stdin) current_file = "<stanard input>";
00031                 line_num = 1;
00032                 yyparse();
00033                 if (yyin != stdin) fclose(yyin);
00034         }
00035         current_file = "";
00036         line_num = 0;
00037         return (yyin != NULL);
00038 }
